articles.title: EU leaders meet to discuss tougher Russia sanctions, US tariffs and Middle East conflicts - AP News
articles.description: European Union leaders are meeting in Brussels to address key global and regional issues. They will discuss Thursday tougher sanctions on Russia, U.S. trade tariffs, and the Middle East conflicts. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will join via videocon…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The heads of the European Unions 27 member nations will meet Thursday in Brussels to discuss tougher sanctions on Russia, ways to prevent painful new U.S. tariffs, and how to make their… [+1860 chars]
